data.text: Hanchu, taksa tieng ei richibul Abraham hah i angin mo ei misîr rang ani zoi? Inmo a sinthona a lei intem?
Sintho sika thei intum nirese chu, Abraham'n song rang imini chu a dôn rang kêng, hannirese Pathien mitmua chu ni mak.
4:3: Aph 15:6; Gal 3:6Pathien lekhabu'n imo ati? “Abraham'n Pathien a iema, a taksônna sika han Pathien'n midikin a pom ani,” ati.
Sinthopu rathaman chu lungkham pêk niloiin lâkâi anga be ani uol, an sinthona an man kêng ani.
Aniatachu mingei hah an sintho han midika tel nimak ngeia nunsiengei ngâidampu Pathien taksônna sikin kêng ani.
Mi Sintho sika niloia Pathien'n dikna a minchang ngei satvur anni tie, David khom hi anghin a ril:
“An tho minchâinangei ngâidamin a oma,
Pumapa'n sietna dôn a be loi ngei chu satvur an ni!”
Ha satvurna hah sertan ngei rang vai mo? Sertanloi ngei rang khom mo? Abraham'n taksônna sikin dikna achang ei tia.
A sertan mâna chong mo, a tan suole mo? nimak, sertan suole nimaka, sertan mân ani.

4:11: Aph 17:10A sertan mâna a taksônna sika, Pathien'n thei a minchang minenna ranga sertan kêng ani. Hanchu sertan khom no rese iemna sika Pathien'n thei a minchang ngei ta rangin chu Abraham chu an rathatienga pa ani.
Sertan ngei pa khom ani, sertan anni vai sika niloiin ei pa Abraham'n a sertan mâna an taksôn angdêna iemna an nei sika ani.
Balam jôm sik niloiin, iemna sika thei minchang a lei ni, Pathien'n Abraham kôm, ama le a jâisuon ngeiin rammuol hih la luo an tih, ti a khâm ani.
4:14: Gal 3:18 Balam jôm hih rochon luona anînchu, taksônna hih akorong nîng ata, chongkhâm khom hah kâmomloi ani, tina nîng a tih.
Balam han Pathien taksina a minsuok ngâi balam boina hanchu minchâina khom om ngâi mak.

Masikin, chongkhâm hah Abraham jâisuonngei murdi rangin balam a jôm ngei mang niloiin ama taksôn anga iempungei rang khomin Pathien manboipêk a nitie min langna rangin iemna sikin ani Abraham kôma chong a lei khâm hah, ama hah ratha tienga ei rênga ei pa ani.

4:17: Aph 17:5 Pathien lekhabu'n, “Nam tamtak pa'n nang ki minchang zoi” a tia, inkhâmna hah Pathien tieng chu asa ani. Hi chongkhâm hih Abraham'n ai iem Pathien mithi ngei minringnôkpu le neinun a omloi ngei min ompu kôm renga ai mu ani.
4:18: Aph 15:5 Abraham han sabei rang aboi tet nûk khomin ala sabei ngit sikin, “Nam tamtak ngei pa,” a hongchang zoi ani. Pathien chongin, “Na jâisuonngei ârsi dôr la nîng an tih,” ati anghan.
4:19: Aph 17:17 Kum raza mi ani zoia a taksa mindon nân chu mithi angdôr ani zoia, Sarah khom aching ani ti a riet chien pum khomin a taksônna chu duoi uol mak.
Taksônna insamin Pathien chongkhâm hah mindon kârminlak maka, a taksônna a rât uol uola Pathien a chôiminsânga.
Pathien'n a chongkhâm tuonmintung thei ngêt a tih, ti a riet minthâr sikin.
Masika han kêng, “A taksônna sika thei minchang ani,” ti ani.
Hi chong, “midika pom ani,” ti hih ama chungroi misîrna rang manga miziek ni maka.
Eini, ei Pumapa Jisua thina renga kaithoipu iemngei sika dikna intum sai ngei rang khomin miziek ani.
4:25: Isa 53:4,5 Jisua hah ei sietnangei sikin thatin a oma Pathien makunga dikna intum theina rangin kaithoiin a om nôk ani.
